Token Endpoints¶

Token Create¶

Use this endpoint to obtain user authentication token

Default URL: /token/login/

Method

Request

Response

POST

  • {{ User.USERNAME_FIELD }}

  • password

HTTP_200_OK

  • auth_token

Token Destroy¶

Use this endpoint to logout user (remove user authentication token).

Default URL: /token/logout/

Method

Request

Response

POST

–

HTTP_204_NO_CONTENT
Previous
